label: Access Management
definition: Purposes associated with managing access to infrastructure, resources, and services as part of healthcare

label: Administrative Services Provision
definition: Purposes associated with the provision of administrative services related to healthcare

label: Appointment Scheduling
definition: Purposes associated with scheduling appointments for use of healthcare services

label: Behavioural Health Determinant
definition: Information about behavioural data impacting on health

label: Biobank Data
definition: Information about electronic health data from biobanks and associated databases

label: Health-related Administrative Data on Claims
definition: Information about health-related administrative data on claims

label: Clinical Investigations Data
definition: Information about health data from clinical investigations

label: Clinical Studies Data
definition: Information about health data from clinical studies

label: Clinical Trials Data
definition: Information about health data from clinical trials

label: Compatibility Unknown
definition: Status indicating the compatibility for reuse of health data for the context is currently unknown

label: Consultation Management
definition: Purposes associated with managing consultations as part of healthcare services

label: Crisis Management
definition: Purposes associated with management of crisis situations in relation to healthcare services

label: Develop Public Health Products and Services
definition: Purposes associated with developing products and services that contribute to public health

label: Develop Social Security Products and Services
definition: Purposes associated with developing products and services that contribute to social security

label: Diagnosis Management
definition: Purposes associated with conducting and managing diagnosis as part of healthcare services

label: Diagnostic Optimisation
definition: Purposes associated with identifying optimisations related to use of diagnosis tools and processes as part of healthcare services

label: Digital Health Authority
definition: An authority tasked with overseeing the implementation and enforcement of primary use provisions

label: Disaster Relief Management
definition: Purposes associated with management of disaster relief and related crisis situations in relation to healthcare services

label: Discharge Report
definition: Information about discharge reports

label: Disease Prevention Awareness
definition: Purposes associated with management of disease prevention awareness as part of healthcare services

label: Disease Registry Data
definition: Information about electronic health data from medical registries for specific diseases

label: Health-related Administrative Data on Dispensations
definition: Information about health-related administrative data on dispensations

label: Dispensation Management
definition: Purposes associated with dispensation of products, devices and other healthcare-related resources

label: Electronic Health Record (EHR) Data
definition: Information about electronic health record data

label: Electronic Health Record System
definition: A system whereby the software and/or hardware allows electronic health record data to be collected and processed, to be used by healthcare providers when providing patient care or by patients when accessing their electronic health data

label: Electronic Health Record System Distributor
definition: Actor that distributes electronic health record systems

label: Electronic Health Record System Importer
definition: Actor that imports electronic health record systems

label: Electronic Health Record System Manufacturer
definition: Actor that manufactures electronic health record systems

label: Electronic Health Record System Supplier
definition: Actor that supplies electronic health record systems

label: Effectiveness Assessment
definition: Purposes associated with assessing the effectiveness of healthcare infrastructure and services

label: Electronic Dispensation
definition: Information about electronic dispensations

label: Electronic Health Data
definition: Information about electronic health data, including personal and non-personal data

label: Electronic Health Data Access Service
definition: Technical service, such as an online portal or application, that allows data subjects to access their electronic health data or the electronic health data of those natural persons whose electronic health data they are legally authorised to access

label: Electronic Prescription
definition: Information about electronic prescriptions

label: Electronic Records Management
definition: Purposes associated with management of patient information in electronic forms for healthcare services

label: Eligibility Assessment
definition: Purposes associated with assessment of eligibility to receive or continue to receive healthcare services

label: Emergency Care Communication
definition: Purposes associated with management of communication for emergency care as part of healthcare services

label: Emergency Care Dispatch
definition: Purposes associated with management of emergency care dispatch as part of healthcare services

label: Emergency Care Eligibility Assessment
definition: Purposes associated with assessment of eligibility to receive or continue to receive emergency care as part of healthcare services

label: Emergency Care Management
definition: Purposes associated with management of emergency care as part of healthcare services

label: Emergency Care Triage
definition: Purposes associated with management of prioritisation and other triage processes as part of emergency care in healthcare services

label: Ensure Quality and Safety of Healthcare
definition: Purposes associated with ensuring high levels of quality and safety of healthcare, including patients safety

label: Ensure Quality and Safety of Medical Devices
definition: Purposes associated with ensuring high levels of quality and safety of medical devices

label: Ensure Quality and Safety of Medicinal Products
definition: Purposes associated with ensuring high levels of quality and safety of medicinal products

label: Environmental Health Determinant
definition: Information about environmental data impacting on health

label: Epigenomic Data
definition: Information about epigenomic data

label: Fitness Nutrition Awareness
definition: Purposes associated with management of fitness and nutrition awareness as part of healthcare services

label: Fraud Prevention Detection
definition: Purposes associated with fraud prevention and detection in relation to healthcare services

label: Genetic Condition Diagnosis
definition: Purposes associated with conducting and managing genetic diagnosis as part of healthcare services

label: Genomic Data
definition: Information about genomic data

label: Health-related Administrative Data
definition: Information about health-related administrative data

label: Health Aggregated Data
definition: Information about aggregated data related to health and healthcare

label: Health Application
definition: Software component for the processing of electronic health data, specifically for providing information on the health of natural persons, or the delivery of care for purposes other than the provision of healthcare

label: Health Data Access Body
definition: An entity responsible for granting access to electronic health data for secondary use

label: Health Data Holder
definition: Entity that has the authority to use and make available health data (draft definition)

label: Health Data User
definition: Entity that has requested or obtained access to use health data (draft definition)

label: Health Inequality Analysis
definition: Purposes associated with detecting, analysing, and identifying ways to mitigate inequality in provision and use of healthcare services

label: Health Insurance Management
definition: Purposes associated with managing health insurance as part of healthcare services

label: Health Professional
definition: An entity that works as a health professional

label: Health Professional Access Service
definition: Technical service, supported by an EHR system, that enables health professionals to access data of natural persons under their care

label: Health Professional Data
definition: Information about the status of the health professionals involved in the treatment of the person, including information on their specialisation and institution

label: Health Questionnaire
definition: Information about health data from questionnaires

label: Health Registry Data
definition: Information about registries of health data

label: Health Survey
definition: Information about health data from surveys

label: Health Trend Analysis
definition: Purposes associated with analysing trends in public health and safety

label: Healthcare Management
definition: Purposes associated with management of healthcare infrastructure and services

label: Healthcare Provider
definition: An entity that provides healthcare-related services

label: Healthcare Scientific Research
definition: Purposes associated with healthcare scientific research

label: Healthcare Service Management
definition: Purposes associated with management of healthcare services

label: Home Care Management
definition: Purposes associated with management of home healthcare services

label: Identity Fraud Management
definition: Purposes associated with identity prevention and detection in relation to healthcare services

label: Improve Healthcare
definition: Purposes associated with improving healthcare systems, including the delivery of care and the provision and optimisation of treatment

label: Improve Healthcare Education
definition: Purposes associated with improving the provision of healthcare education

label: Inferred Health Data
definition: Information about inferred health data, including improvements such as correction, annotation, or enrichment based on authorised processing operations

label: Insurance Claim Fraud Management
definition: Purposes associated with insurance fraud prevention and detection in relation to healthcare services

label: Insurance Management
definition: Purposes associated with management of insurance as part of providing healthcare services

label: Interoperability Software for EHR System
definition: Software component of the EHR system which provides and receives personal electronic health data under a priority category for primary use established under the EHDS Regulation in the European electronic health record exchange format

label: Life Insurance Management
definition: Purposes associated with managing life insurance as part of healthcare services

label: Lifestyle Data
definition: Information about lifestyle

label: Lipidomic Data
definition: Information about lipidomic data

label: Logging Software for EHR System
definition: Software component of the EHR system which provides logging information related to access by health professionals or other individuals to priority categories of personal electronic health data

label: Medical Condition Diagnosis
definition: Purposes associated with conducting and managing medical diagnosis as part of healthcare services

label: Medical Device Manufacturer
definition: Actor that manufactures medical devices

label: Medical Devices Data
definition: Information about electronic health data from medical devices

label: Medical Devices Dispensation
definition: Purposes associated with the dispensation of medical devices

label: Medical Devices Prescription
definition: Purposes associated with prescription of medical devices

label: Medical Devices Provision
definition: Purposes associated with the provision of medical devices

label: Medical Devices Registry Data
definition: Information about electronic health data from registries for medical devices

label: Medical Imaging
definition: Information about medical imaging studies and related imaging reports

label: Medical Registry Data
definition: Information about electronic health data from medical registries

label: Medical Resource Optimisation
definition: Purposes associated with identifying optimisations related to use of medical resources as part of healthcare services

label: Medical Test Result
definition: Information about medical test results

label: Medicinal Products Dispensation
definition: Purposes associated with the dispensation of medicinal products

label: Medicinal Products Prescription
definition: Purposes associated with prescription of medicinal products

label: Medicinal Products Provision
definition: Purposes associated with the provision of medicinal products

label: Medicinal Products Registry Data
definition: Information about electronic health data from registries for medicinal products

label: Mental Health Awareness
definition: Purposes associated with management of mental health awareness as part of healthcare services

label: Mental Health Condition Diagnosis
definition: Purposes associated with conducting and managing mental health diagnosis as part of healthcare services

label: Metabolomic Data
definition: Information about metabolomic data

label: Mortality Registry Data
definition: Information about electronic health data from mortality registries

label: Non-Personal Electronic Health Data
definition: Information about electronic health data that is not personal data, including anonymised data

label: Optimisation
definition: Purposes associated with identifying optimisations to use and provision of healthcare services

label: Pandemic Response Management
definition: Purposes associated with management of pandemics and related crisis situations in relation to healthcare services

label: Pathogen Data
definition: Information about relevant pathogen data, impacting on human health

label: Patient Chronic Condition Monitoring
definition: Purposes associated with monitoring of patients with chronic conditions for health and safety as part of healthcare services

label: Patient Consent Management
definition: Purposes associated with management of consent from or related to patients in relation to healthcare services

label: Patient Information Management
definition: Purposes associated with management of patient information in relation to healthcare services

label: Patient Intensive Care Monitoring
definition: Purposes associated with monitoring of patients in intensive care as part of healthcare services

label: Patient Monitoring
definition: Purposes associated with monitoring of patients for treatment and safety as part of healthcare services

label: Patient Post Treatment Monitoring
definition: Purposes associated with monitoring of patients post-treatment for health and safety as part of healthcare services

label: Patient Remote Monitoring
definition: Purposes associated with remote monitoring of patients for treatment and safety as part of healthcare services

label: Patient Summary
definition: Information about patient summaries

label: Patient Treatment Effectiveness Monitoring
definition: Purposes associated with monitoring of treatment effectiveness as part of healthcare services

label: Patient Treatment Outcome Analysis
definition: Purposes associated with analysis of patient treatment outcomes as part of healthcare services

label: Performance Studies Data
definition: Information about health data from performance studies

label: Person Generated Health Application Data
definition: Information about person generated digital health applications data

label: Person Generated Health Data
definition: Information about person generated electronic health data

label: Person Generated Medical Devices Data
definition: Information about person generated medical devices data

label: Person Generated Wellness Application Data
definition: Information about person generated wellness applications data

label: Personal Electronic Health Data
definition: Information about personal health data, including genetic data, processed in an electronic form

label: Personalised Healthcare
definition: Purposes associated with providing personalised healthcare

label: Population Health Analysis
definition: Purposes associated with analysing trends and outcomes in a specific population or group of people regarding health and safety

label: Predictive Health Risk Analysis
definition: Purposes associated with analysing and predicting risks to public health and safety

label: Prescription Management
definition: Purposes associated with prescription of products, devices and other healthcare-related resources

label: Preventative Care Management
definition: Purposes associated with management of preventative care as part of healthcare services

label: Primary Care Management
definition: Purposes associated with management of primary healthcare services

label: Primary Use
definition: Status indicating the reuse of health is compatible with the original purpose or use i.e. it can be considered as 'Primary Use'
scopenote: Primary Use refers to an assessment where two contexts are found to be compatible, e.g. if purpose is used to test compatibility, then for two activities the second activity is said be the primary use if its purpose is compatible with the first activity's purpose

label: Protect against Cross-border Threats to Health
definition: Purposes associated with the protection against serious cross-border threats to health

label: Proteomic Data
definition: Information about proteomic data

label: Provide Healthcare Official Statistics
definition: Purposes associated with facilitating the development, production and dissemination of reliable official statistics related to health or care sectors

label: Providers Data Sharing
definition: Purposes associated with sharing of patient information between healthcare providers, such as between hospitals treating the same patient

label: Public Health Monitoring
definition: Purposes associated with monitoring of public health as part of healthcare services

label: Public Health Registry Data
definition: Information about registries of public health data

label: Public Health Surveillance
definition: Purposes associated with public health surveillance

label: Public Interest related to Health
definition: Purposes associated with pursuing activities for reasons of public interest in the area of public and occupational health

label: Public Policy Making
definition: Purposes associated with public policy making policymaking in the healthcare sector

label: Referral Management
definition: Purposes associated with management of referrals as part of healthcare services

label: Health-related Administrative Data on Reimbursements
definition: Information about health-related administrative data on reimbursements

label: Reimbursement Services Provision
definition: Purposes associated with the provision of reimbursement services related to healthcare

label: Research Cohort Data
definition: Information about health data from research cohorts

label: Research Development
definition: Purposes associated with research and development regarding healthcare services

label: Resource Management
definition: Purposes associated with management of resources related to healthcare services

label: ReuseCompatibility
definition: Status indicating whether the reuse of health data is compatible for given context
scopenote: Compatibility refers to whether two contexts, such as dpv:Process instances, are compatible with each other based on a criteria which is not defined by the concept. This criteria can be based on requirements from law, such as GDPR's purpose compatibility or can be based on privacy norms such as contextual integrity. To express such interpretations, further concepts should be expanded from this base concept

label: Second Medical Opinion
definition: Purposes associated with the management of a consultation with a healthcare professional other than the initial one to review a diagnosis or treatment plan

label: Secondary Use
definition: Status indicating the reuse of health is incompatible with the original purpose or use i.e. it is considered as 'Secondary Use'
scopenote: Secondary Use refers to an assessment where two contexts are found to be incompatible, e.g. if purpose is used to test compatibility, then for two activities the second activity is said be the secondary use if its purpose is incompatible with the first activity's purpose

label: Security Management
definition: Purposes associated with management of security in relation to healthcare services

label: Service Billing Fraud Management
definition: Purposes associated with billing prevention and detection in relation to healthcare services

label: Service Provision
definition: Purposes associated with provision of healthcare services

label: Social Services Provision
definition: Purposes associated with the provision of social services related to healthcare

label: Socioeconomic Health Determinant
definition: Information about socioeconomic data impacting on health

label: Specialised Care Management
definition: Purposes associated with management of specialised healthcare services

label: Study Data
definition: Information about health data from studies, e.g. clinical trials, research cohorts, ...

label: Support Authorities in Regulatory Activities
definition: Purposes associated with supporting authorities to carry out their regulatory tasks

label: Electronic Health Record System
definition: A system whereby the software and/or hardware allows personal electronic health data to be collected and processed, to be used by healthcare providers when providing patient care or by patients when accessing their electronic health data

label: Train, Test and Evaluate AI Systems Algorithms
definition: Purposes associated with training, testing and evaluating algorithms in AI systems

label: Train, Test and Evaluate Health-related Algorithms
definition: Purposes associated with training, testing and evaluating health-related algorithms

label: Train, Test and Evaluate Health Apps Algorithms
definition: Purposes associated with training, testing and evaluating algorithms in digital health applications

label: Train, Test and Evaluate Medical Devices Algorithms
definition: Purposes associated with training, testing and evaluating algorithms in medical devices

label: Transcriptomic Data
definition: Information about transcriptomic data

label: Treatment Optimisation
definition: Purposes associated with identifying optimisations related to use of treatments and related processes as part of healthcare services

label: Vaccination Management
definition: Purposes associated with management of vaccinations as part of healthcare services

label: Wellness App Distributor
definition: Actor that distributes wellness apps

label: Wellness App Manufacturer
definition: Actor that manufactures wellness apps

label: Wellness App Supplier
definition: Actor that supplies wellness apps

label: Wellness Application
definition: Software component for the processing of electronic health data originating from wellness applications

label: Wellness Data
definition: Information about wellness

label: Workforce Management
definition: Purposes associated with management of workforce involved in provision of healthcare services
